uniandes.unacloud.share.db

Class PhysicalMachineManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniandes.unacloud.share.db.PhysicalMachineManager

  • public class PhysicalMachineManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to execute query, update and delete processes in database for Physical machine Entity.
    Author:
    CesarF

      • setPhysicalMachine

        Update a physical machine entity on database.
        Parameters:
        machine - to be modified
        con - Database connection
        Returns:
